ygData.subject: Re: Bases and Quasar
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron stepped out of the CR chamber, he was the last to go in and now his troops looked to him for the next move. Hell Beast, who was still a bit ill, slept

    Megatron stepped out of the CR chamber, he was the last to go in and now 
his troops looked to him for the next move. Hell Beast, who was still a bit 
ill, slept mostly.
    "According to this screen Megatron, Killfests team is held up here." 
Black Aracnia said. She stood before the viewscreen displaying the battle 
area. "I believe is used to be yours and Kitkats former base."
    Megatron thought a moment. Wht the hell would Killfest go to that heap? 
It was decimated, destroyed. Surely he couldnt hope to settle himself and his 
forces there. But, prehaps he had a trick up his sleeve. Mabey he was looking 
for something....mabey Megatron missed something very important that Killfest 
knew about.
    "Hmm, very interesting indeed. Mabey we shall put off the attack on the 
Maximals and hit Killfest and his men agian. Here." He pointed one large 
transmetal purple finger to the rock quarry to the east of the cave. 
    "If we got them there, we could finish them alomst." Tarantulas said, 
from behinde a computer terminal. "But dont you think Killfest would be 
expecting us?"
    Megatron did take that into consideration. Killfest was clever, but he 
and his men were damaged. Megatrons men had the advantage of being repaired. 
If they did strike Killfest, Megatron and his men would have the upper hand.
    "I want to scout it out first. Nighteyes, and Waspinator, you will go and 
send back any images you record." Megatron said, turing to them.
    Nighteyes bowed her panther head. "If Megatron says it, it is to be done. 
I will go."
    Waspinator buzzed over to Megatron and began to praise his leader for 
such an important task. Megatron swatted them away and sent them to see what 
Killfest was up to. ...And if they were spotted, and Killfest did open fire, 
Megatron guessed he woul;d have no choice but to engage him agian. And after 
that, agian, and agian, and agian.

    Ominous watched his four troops enter the Orb. For now Quasar was in the 
ship. She wouldnt get far, not in the Ord. It was like a giant energon 
reactor, one wrong move and she could vaporize herself.
    "Putnam, where is Darkmouse?" He demanded, slamming his fist agianst a 
small side table. His tone of voice was angry.
    Putnam held out his arms in defeat. "They alluded us sir. Once we repair, 
we shall go back. Mabey, under your leadership?" He said.
    Ominous waved them away in disgust, away to the Energon CR Chambers. He 
supposed he would need to lead them into battle next time. ut, for now, he 
was going to get that little arachnid Quasar.
